    xmonad $ defaultConfig…
markdownRemark.html:
Fix GUI when using java apps on xmonad

You need to set the right startupHook , which is

import XMonad.Hooks.SetWMName …

main = do xmonad $ defaultConfig { modMask = mod4Mask , startupHook = setWMName “LG3D” — other customizations }

The complete guide is found at https://wiki.haskell.org/Xmonad/Frequently_asked_questions#Preferred_Method
